entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Watson Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:35 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -32.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Watson Lake Airport 3:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -32.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -35.9°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 35.
